_header: When that birds be brought to rest
_description: A Dialogue between a lover and a lass — eight cross-rhymed quatrains

BodRawC813.First Lines:
when that byrdes be brought to restwythe Ioy and myrth a greate
                    honour…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…and yn a place of priuyteyour bryde shall hoppe yn my
                    cage
